arts.ttl: Luis Suarez appears to spit at Seattle Sounders coach after Inter Miami loss
arts.sum: The former Liverpool and Barcelona superstar reacted furiously after Inter Miami’s defeat to Seattle Sounders in the Leagues Cup final

arts.ttl: Miami's Suárez appears to spit on Seattle staffer
arts.sum: Inter Miami forward Luis Suárez appeared to spit on a Seattle Sounders staffer after his team's 3-0 loss in the Leagues Cup final at Lumen Field on Sunday night.

arts.ttl: Osaze De Rosario helps Sounders blank Lionel Messi and Inter Miami 3-0 in Leagues Cup final
arts.sum: Osaze De Rosario scored in the 26th minute, and the Seattle Sounders blanked Lionel Messi and Inter Miami 3-0 on Sunday night to win the Leagues Cup. Messi, who led Miami to the Leagues Cup title in 2023, had plenty of scoring chances, including one off a brilliant pass from Suárez in the 49th minute.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami, Seattle Sounders Scuffle Casts Shadow Over Leagues Cup Celebrations
arts.sum: Inter Miami fell short in the Leagues Cup Final with a 3–0 loss to Seattle Sounders FC.

arts.ttl: Seattle Sounders Win Leagues Cup in Dominant Fashion Over Messi’s Inter Miami
arts.sum: Osaze De Rosario scored from a headed-in cross in the first half, before Alex Roldan and Paul Rothrock sealed the game in the final 10 minutes, as Seattle claimed the Leagues Cup with a 3–0 victory in front of over 69,000 fans. De Rosario, the son of four-time MLS Cup champion Dwayne De Rosario, opened the scoring in the 26th minute with his fourth goal of the tournament, leaping to head Alex Roldan’s cross past Miami goalkeeper Oscar Ustari.

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi and Inter Miami DESTROYED in Leagues Cup final by Seattle Sounders
arts.sum: The soccer legend was unable to inspire Miami to victory at Lumen Field, where goals from Osaze De Rosario, Alex Roldan and Paul Rothrock earned the Sounders a famous three-goal win.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs. Seattle Sounders: Leagues Cup Final Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The Seattle Sounders aim for a ninth trophy, while Miami seeks to win a second Leagues Cup on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami Predicted Lineup vs. Seattle Sounders: Messi, Herons Seek Second Leagues Cup Title
arts.sum: Lionel Messi helped Inter Miami win their first Leagues Cup in just his first few games with the club in 2023.

arts.ttl: When does Messi play in the 2025 Leagues Cup final? Date and TV channel for Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders
arts.sum: Inter Miami's opponent will be one of the most consistent clubs in the top places of the league played in the United States and Canada, we are talking about Seattle Sounders, who, despite having their first match as visitors in Carson, California, against Los Angeles Galaxy, ended up winning with authority to advance to their second Leagues Cup final, they are looking for revenge for the defeat in 2021 at the hands of Panzas Verdes del Leon. On the other hand, the two semifinal losers will also face off in the third-place game in a game that has its importance as the winner between Orlando City and Los Angeles Galaxy will have its ticket secured for the Concacaf Champions Cup in 2026, tickets that Inter Miami and Seattle Sounders already have.

arts.ttl: Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders: What time does Messi play and where to watch the 2025 Leagues Cup final?
arts.sum: What time does Inter Miami vs Seattle Sounders kick off in the 2025 Leagues Cup final? The clash between Messi and the Sounders will be broadcast live in the United States on Apple TV+ and additionally on Univision and TUDN.
